description: React component for managing templates, including creating, editing, deleting, and displaying templates fetched from a Supabase 'templates' table.

methods.name: fetchItems
methods.description: Fetches templates from the Supabase database and updates the component state.

methods.name: startNew
methods.description: Initializes the editing state for creating a new template.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Sets the editing state with an existing template for editing.

methods.name: cancelEdit
methods.description: Resets the editing state to cancel editing.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a new or existing template to the database, with validation.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a template from the database after user confirmation.

calls: supabase.from("templates").update({ name: editing.name, type: editing.type, body: editing.body }).eq("id", editing.id).select()
supabase.from("templates").insert([{ name: editing.name, type: editing.type, body: editing.body }]).select()
